name: BuildZone
description:
BuildZone is a unique turn-based strategy game. Each player will place buildings on a 5x5 grid trying to destroy the other player. It has total of 13 different buildings to choose from, and each of them has unique uses. Most of the buildings are also completely neutral, so their usefulness or harmfulness depends entirely on positioning.

While the game is mainly multiplayer, it does have a simple AI (Artificial Intelligence) to play against for practicing purposes, but any experienced players should play against real opponents for a challenge.
